attributes.action: Rename the Colin Bell stand at the Etihad Stadium the Colin Bell Kippax stand
attributes.additional_details:
The atmosphere is rubbish
People don't go to the game just to watch good football, atmosphere is a key part of the experience. When spectators talk about iconic sporting moments, they are referring to the atmosphere more than the sporting performance 
Passion from the crowd is proven to instil passion within the players and scare the opposition
attributes.background: Decline in atmosphere is severely affecting enjoyment of a traditional pastime

rejection.details: We cannot accept your petition as the decision about how to name a stand is a matter for Manchester City football club not the the UK Government or Parliament. You might want to contact the club directly with your suggestion.
